name: RamadanCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open Ramadan Countdown”
”Alexa, start Ramadan Countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ramadan countdown
des:
This is a simple Ramadan countdown skill. Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days until the first day of Ramadan. It will also tell you how many days left until the last day of Ramadan. These dates are based on approximations and may change. 
For any requests to this skill, send an email to bbh187@gmail.com.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
